member.name: T:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation
member.summary: Android implementation of secure storage. Done using KeyStore Make sure to initialize store password for Android.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor created or loads the store

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.GetValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the value from storage. If value with the given key does not exist, returns default value

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.SetValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the given key. If value exists, overwrites it Else creates new entry. Does not accept null value.

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.DeleteKey(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the key and corresponding value from the storage

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.HasKey(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether specified key exists in the storage

member.name: T:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.StringKeyEntry
member.summary: Class for storing string as entry

member.name: M:Plugin.SecureStorage.SecureStorageImplementation.StringKeyEntry.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor makes sure that entry is valid. Converts it to bytes
